item.trans: n. 大使馆；大使馆全体人员 同义词:ambassade, chancellery You must apply for your visa at the Australian embassy .你必须到澳大利亚大使馆去申请签证。

adj. 幸运的；侥幸的；吉祥的；带来幸运的 同义词:lucky, providential His father told Raul Gonzalez Blanco that he would be a curator and that one day , if he were fortunate , he would play football for Atletico Madrid.父亲告诉劳尔*萨雷斯*兰科，他将会成为一个足球运动员，如果幸运的话，也许有一天他可以入选马德里竞技队。
vi. 喘气；喘息；渴望 vt. 气喘吁吁地说；喘着气说话 n. 喘气 同义词:blow, rare, puff out, broken wind, pursiness After running such a long way, the messenger was gasping for breath.传令兵在跑了这么长一段路后，直喘粗气。
n. 阿姨；姑妈；伯母；舅妈 Oh, we visited my aunt and uncle .我们拜访了我的叔叔和婶婶。
n. 调查；测量；审视；纵览 vt. 调查；勘测；俯瞰 vi. 测量土地 同义词:investigation, measurement, probe, research, examine, check into He surveyed Arthur Hailey's novels before presenting the award.颁奖之前他概括地评述了阿瑟黑利的小说。
adj. 严肃的；不笑的 同义词:serious, grave, solemn Mrs Rumbold was a large, unsmiling lady in a tight black dress .朗博尔德夫人是一个身材高大，不带笑容的女人，穿着紧身黑色衣裙。
vt. 在树皮上刻路标；公开宣布 n. 火焰，烈火；光辉；情感爆发 vi. 燃烧；照耀，发光；激发 同义词:tell the world, go public, flame, brilliance, burn, to shine The dry wood blazed up at the touch of a match.火柴一划干木头就着火了。
n. 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门 vi. 转向左舷 vt. 持（枪）；左转舵 同义词:haven, bunder Port arms!(口令)持枪!
n. 多样；种类；杂耍 同义词:category, manner, nature, kind, sort Readers should benefit from the greater variety .读者应该受益于更大的多样性。
n. 美杜莎（古希腊神话中3位蛇发女怪之一） 同义词:acaleph, aurelia It is this form that grows into the adult medusa jellyfish .正是碟状幼体产生了成年的水母体海蜇。
adj. 活着的；活泼的；有生气的 同义词:lively, activated For years she cherished the hope that her husband might still be alive .多年来，她一直抱有她的丈夫可能仍活在人世的希望。

vt. 节约，吝惜；饶恕；分出，分让 vi. 饶恕，宽恕；节约 adj. 多余的；瘦的；少量的 n. 剩余；备用零件 同义词:economize on, save on, excuse from, economize on, thin, unnecessary, waste, redundant, superfluous, surplus, residual to spare one's enemy宽恕了仇人
vt. 悬挂，垂下；装饰；绞死；使悬而未决 vi. 悬着，垂下；被绞死；悬而不决 n. 悬挂；暂停，中止 同义词:paint, swing from, trail, moratorium, pause She took off her overcoat and hanged it on the hook.她脱下大衣，把它挂在了挂钩上。
n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站 vt. 举行；上演；筹划 vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行 同义词:drama, phase, age, grade, theater, celebrate, put on, come off, to hold A new hit drama will be stagged next week.一部新的具轰动效应的话剧将于下星期上演。
n. 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词 vi. 报信，报告；[通信] 报文 vt. 通知 同义词:news, prediction, word, inform of, report to, give notice, instruct, advise of The myth is the message .而神话，也就是寓言。
n. 艺术；美术；艺术品 adj. 艺术的；艺术品的 v. 是（be的变体） 同义词:beaux-arts, artwork, artistic, are, am What about art and literature ?艺术和文学方面如何？
vt. 拉；拔；拖 vi. 拉，拖；拔 n. 拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖 同义词:draw, snake, draw, tension, digging rope Sam and John are pulling the rope.山姆和约翰在拔河。
adv. 正式地；官方地；作为公务员 同义词:formally, in state Officially , this week 's strikes were against the government 's plans to end the special regimes .据官方消息，本周的罢工是针对政府要终结特别体制方案的计划。
vt. 逃避，避免；被忘掉 vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走 n. 逃跑；逃亡 同义词:get out of, shun, get away, keep clear of, hijra, desertion to escape from the burning house逃出失火的房子
n. 采集，聚集；[税收] 征收；收藏品；募捐 同义词:clustering, gather He also has many dreams in his collection .他的收藏中也有许多的梦想。
n. 潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟 同义词:ducker, plunger He would suffer from the change in pressure like a diver who comes out of deep water too fast .否则，他们就会像潜水员从深水过快浮上水面那样因为压力突然变化而受到伤害。
n. 舞蹈；舞会；舞曲 vi. 跳舞；跳跃；飘扬 vt. 跳舞；使跳跃 adj. 舞蹈的；用于跳舞的 同义词:ball, nautch, flow, foot, jump, stream, jump, bound, orchestic, terpsichorean The boys and girls danced to the disco music.少男少女们跟着迪斯科音乐跳舞。
n. 观察；视野；意见；风景 vt. 观察；考虑；查看 同义词:observation, opinion, scenery, scope, comment, watch, study, regard, think of, think about We will go and view the house before we buy it.在买房前我们先去看一看房子。

prep. 从；外；离；除；超过；以前的（附在名词前，用于带连词号的复合词） 同义词:from, beyond, without, above, than The Iraqi who threw his boot Ex- president Bush will face trial for assaulting foreign leaders .向前总统布什扔鞋的那个伊拉克人将因袭击外国领导人罪面临审判。
n. 蛇；阴险的人 vi. 迂回前进 vt. 拉（木材等）；迂回前进 同义词:serpent, rat-face, wind one's way, pull, draw to snake one's way through a crowd在人群中迂回穿行
n. 神经；勇气；[植] 叶脉 vt. 鼓起勇气 同义词:courage, heart, take courage, get up the courage She was finally nerved to tell him that she was already a wife.她终于鼓起勇气告诉他，她已经为人之妻了。
n. 经理；管理人员 同义词:executive, gerente Could you introduce me to the manager ?能请您把我介绍给经理吗?。
adj. 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的；非常好的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro She drew immense strength and wisdom from the masses .她从群众中吸取了巨大的力量和智慧。
n. 根；根源；词根；祖先 vi. 生根；根除 vt. 生根，固定；根源在于 同义词:parent, principle, father, radix, radicate, fix on, hold in place Roses will not root in such acid soil.玫瑰在这种酸性土壤中不会生根。
n. 展览，显示；展览会；展览品 同义词:expo, display, show, fair, manifestation The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
n. 房东，老板；地主 同义词:boss, employer landlord put a new stove in my room .房东在我房间里放了一个新暖炉。
adj. 舒适的，舒服的 n. 盖被 同义词:pleasant, easy, cozy Very comfortable and quiet .很舒服，也很安静。
vt. 击败，战胜；挫败；使…失败 n. 失败；战胜 同义词:down, get the best of, failure, loss, losing, reverse, collapse They defeated the enemy in the battle.他们在那次战斗中打败敌人。
n. [临床] 症状；征兆 同义词:premonitor, prefiguration One symptom is bloating , or expansion of the abdomen area .一种症状就是肿胀，或者在腹部产生膨胀。
n. 注意；言辞 vt. 评论；觉察 vi. 谈论 同义词:regard, notice, publicity, observe on, to comment on, talk of, discourse He remarked that we mustn't judge people solely by their appearences.他说我们绝对不要只以貌取人。
n. 铜；铜币；警察 adj. 铜的 vt. 镀铜于 同义词:police, pig, cupreous Give papa a cup of proper coffee in a copper coffee cup .给爸爸一杯用铜制的咖啡杯盛的味道适宜的咖啡。
adj. 严格的；绝对的；精确的；详细的 同义词:rigid, precise, accurate, mathematical, absolute But as a student , you have to be strict with yourself .但是作为一名学生，你必须要严格要求自己。
vt. 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事 vi. 说服；被说服 adj. 空闲的，有闲的 同义词:satisfy, convince, argue, talk around, win over, available, leisure, off I am trying to persuade him to give up the attempt.我正力图劝他放弃这种尝试。
vt. 处理；加工 n. 过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移 vi. 列队前进 adj. 经过特殊加工（或处理）的 同义词:manufacture, cope with, going on, course, system, method, approach to process leather to make it softer鞣制皮革使其变得柔软
vt. 连接；联合；关连 vi. 连接，连结；联合 同义词:couple, hand in hand, band, combine The two cities are connected by a railway.一条铁路连接起这两个城市。
adv. 意外地；偶然地 同义词:unexpectedly, fortuitously It is the first time that two intact spacecraft have accidentally run into each other, according to NASA .根据美国国家航空航天局（NASA）报告，这是两个完整航天器第一次因意外相撞。

n. 碰撞；崩溃；坠落 vt. 坠落；破碎；撞碎 vi. 碰撞；坠毁；闯；突然倒台 adj. 速成的 同义词:collision, precipitation, impact, fall of, fall to pieces, hit, impact on, quickie She crashed the glass angrily against the table.她愤怒地把玻璃杯摔碎在桌子上。
n. 喜剧；喜剧性；有趣的事情 Life is a comedy to him who thinks and a tragedy to him who feels.对于理性的人才说生活是一出喜剧，而对于感性的人来说生活是一出悲剧。
adj. 悲哀的；令人惋惜的 同义词:sad, threnetical And when you came with those red mournful lips .你带来了猩红嘴唇人间悲伤。
vt. 打算；想要；意指 vi. 有打算 同义词:feel like, propose, wanna, think, desire to intend to do something想做某事

n. 群众,一伙;一堆,许多,大众 v. 拥挤,挤满,挤进 vt. 挤满,将...塞进;催促,催逼 vi. 挤,拥挤,聚集 同义词:burst at the seams, be packed with, lot, band, concentrate, pile, collect, mass, pack They crowded around the table to get their food.他们围着桌子领取食物。
vt. 管理；经营；控制；设法 vi. 处理；应付过去 同义词:possess, run, regulate, conduct, direct, cope with, handle with She managed the household very well.她把家掌管得很好。
n. 文章；物品；条款；[语] 冠词 vt. 订约将…收为学徒或见习生；使…受协议条款的约束 vi. 签订协议；进行控告 同义词:item, provision, clause to article an apprentice立约收一名学徒
n. 诚实，正直 同义词:integrity, truth, good faith, righteousness, veracity Honesty is his most salient characteristic .诚实是他最显著的特点。

adj. 从前的，前者的；前任的 n. 模型，样板；起形成作用的人 同义词:long-ago, old-time, matrix, model, shape, template The problem is that the most practical option for such a corridor would be in former Peruvian territory .现在问题是，这个最切合实际的运输通道将会经过秘鲁的一个原属地区。
vt. 淹没；充满；溢出 vi. 涌出；涌进；为水淹没 n. 洪水；泛滥；一大批 同义词:drown out, inundate, stream, spill into, fresh, flow, inundation The river has flooded the meadows.河水淹没了草地。
vt. 使通风；给…装通风设备；宣布 同义词:air, bill Open the window and ventilate the room.打开窗户，让房间空气流通。
vi. 波动；起伏；挥手示意；摇动；呈波形 vt. 卷（烫）发；向…挥手示意；使成波浪形 n. 波动；波浪；高潮；挥手示意；卷曲 同义词:roll, rock, undulate, fluctuation, undulation flags waving in the breeze在微风中飘扬的旗帜
n. 伏特（电压单位）；环骑；闪避 同义词:jook Chevy Volt , a car that can go up to 40 miles before it uses any gas at all. That 's an American revolution .雪佛兰伏特，能不耗费一滴油跑完40英里。这就是美国式的革命。
vt. 营救；援救 n. 营救；援救；解救 同义词:deliverance They were trying every possible means to rescue the miners trapped underground.他们正在千方百计设法营救围困在井下的矿工。
adj. 同情的；交感神经的；共鸣的；赞同的；和谐的；合意的 n. 交感神经；容易感受的人 同义词:harmonious, balanced, acceptable, vagus nerve Those supposed supporters swore that they would be sympathetic to our plan .那些所谓的支持者发誓说他们会赞成这个计划。

n. 时机，机会；场合；理由 vt. 引起，惹起 同义词:opportunity, chance, opening, sake, reason, attract, cause, produce, operate, induce Yet on the most commonplace occasion I can never know your thoughts .然而即便在最普通的场合我也琢摸不透你的思想。

vi. 退休；撤退；退却 vt. 退休；离开；收回 n. 退休；退隐；退兵信号 同义词:withdraw, beat a retreat, leave, split, quit, superannuation, sequestration According to the new regulations,mining engineers retire at the age of fifty-five.按照新规定，采矿工程师五十五岁退休。
vt. 支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养 n. 支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物 同义词:encourage, facilitate, second, carry, boost, holding, adhesion, backing, advocate to support an old tree with a pole用支杆支撑起一棵古树
n. [光] 双筒望远镜；[光] 双筒镜，[光] 双目镜 No one needs a pair of binoculars to see that .这些东西不用双筒望远镜也能看得到。
n. 洞，孔；洞穴，穴；突破口 vi. 凿洞，穿孔；（高尔夫球等）进洞 vt. 凿洞 同义词:cavity, hollow, aperture, thirl A mole holed the field.鼹鼠在地里挖了许多洞。
vt. 禁止；妨碍，阻止 同义词:bar, dispute, let, stem, block to forbid the use of chemical fertilizers禁止使用化肥

n. 公牛；看好股市者；粗壮如牛的人；胡说八道；印玺 adj. 大型的；公牛似的；雄性的 vt. 企图抬高证券价格；吓唬；强力实现 vi. 价格上涨；走运；猛推；吹牛 同义词:ox, toro, male, large scale, browbeat, gally, price increase, have one's day to attempt to bull the stock market企图使股票行情上涨

adj. 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的 vt. 通过；清除；使干净；跳过 vi. 放晴；变清澈 adv. 清晰地；完全地 n. 清除；空隙 同义词:distinct, liquid, fair, fine, crystal, track, jump, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully, removel, liquidation The rain cleared the air, and the grass smelt fresh and sweet.雨水使空气变得洁净，青草发出清新芬芳的气味。
n. 边缘；优势；刀刃；锋利 vt. 使锐利；将…开刃；给…加上边 vi. 缓缓移动；侧着移动 同义词:margin, superiority, advantage, brink, suburb to edge a knife给刀开刃，磨刀
n. 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐 adj. 节日的，喜庆的；快乐的 同义词:holiday, joy, celebration, cheerful, enjoyable This festival was for the king of the gods .这个节日是为众神之王举办的。
adj. 奇异的；空想的；极好的；不可思议的 n. 古怪的人 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, super, great, weirdo, geezer Write a short passage about your fantastic experience .写一篇小短文，关于你的奇妙的经历。
n. 满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪 同义词:content, fill, satisfied with, Lays They found that people in countries with higher incomes report higher life satisfaction .他们发现收入较高的国家国民对生活满意度较大。
n. 训练；钻孔机；钻子；播种机 vi. 钻孔；训练 vt. 钻孔；训练；条播 同义词:training, discipline, bore a hole, counter sunk, discipline, coach to drill boulders for inserting dynamite在巨石上打眼以便装炸药
n. 上部；上面；上边 同义词:top, upper part He turned and I slapped him right upside the head.他转过身来，我对着他的头部侧面就是一掌。
vt. 油漆；绘画；装饰；描绘 vi. 油漆；绘画 n. 油漆；颜料；绘画作品 同义词:represent, hang, trace, figure, color, pek to paint the window油漆窗户
n. 病，[医] 疾病；弊病 vt. 传染；使…有病 同义词:illness, ill, sickness, complaint, to infect The doctor discovered that his heart was diseased.医生发现他的心脏有病。
n. 地中海 adj. 地中海的 Eels are fast vanishing from Mediterranean , swordfish from the Indian Ocean .鳗鲡正从地中海快速消失，剑鱼正从印度洋消失。
n. 天文台；气象台；瞭望台 同义词:meteorological station, belvedere The primary mirror is 80 cm in diameter , a respectable size even for observatory on the ground .主镜的直径为80厘米，这一口径即使在地面天文台也是很可观的。
n. 火；火灾；炮火；炉火；热情；激情；磨难 vt. 点燃；解雇；开除；使发光；烧制；激动；放枪 vi. 着火；射击；开枪；激动；烧火 同义词:passion, flame, warmth, remove, light, loose, warm, pop to fire a building放火烧一建筑物
n. 鸽子 同义词:La paloma, dove Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。
adv. 苦涩地，悲痛的；残酷地；怨恨地 同义词:relentlessly, cruelly But in a bitterly competitive world , how should a company decide how much to spend on technology ?但是在在一个竞争如此激烈的世界，一家公司如何要决定在技术上花多少钱？
vi. 继续，延续；仍旧，连续 vt. 继续说…；使…继续；使…延长 同义词:run on, carry on with After a short break the play continued.经过短暂的休息以后，戏继续上演。
adv. 实际上；事实上 同义词:really, effectively, virtually, even, practically But now it is actually starting to happen .但是实际上这一切已经开始发生。
n. 国家；州；情形 vt. 规定；声明；陈述 adj. 国家的；州的；正式的 同义词:nation, country, soil, define, regulate, rule, declare, national, formal, official to state one's argument陈述自己的理由
n. 交通；运输；贸易；[通信] 通信量 vt. 用…作交换；在…通行 vi. 交易，买卖 同义词:transportation, commerce, trade, carriage, exchange, trade in to traffic in guns买卖枪炮
n. 蜜蜂，蜂；勤劳的人 同义词:honeybee I am a busy bee .我是一只忙碌的小蜜蜂。
vt. 要求（搭便车） vi. 搭便车 n. 搭便车（旅行） 同义词:require, exact, desire, call for, request for sth, thumb a ride, free ride, free-riding, pick-up They fly , float , hitchhike -- and even explode .种子飞扬，飘散，搭载，甚至爆裂。
n. 基架，基座；基础 vt. 搁在台上；支持；加座 同义词:elements, basis, base, sole, radical, encourage, carry, second, back, hand to be pedestalled in an alcove放在壁龛内的基座上
n. 野餐 vi. 去野餐 同义词:junket The students often picnic at the park.同学们常去公园野餐。

n. 接收器；接受者；收信机；收款员，接待者 同义词:taker, acceptor The challenge modern cryptographers face is for sender and receiver to share a key while ensuring that no one has filched a copy.现代的密码专家所遇到的挑战是，如何让发送者与接收者共同拥有一把钥匙，并保证不会外流。
vt. 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制 vi. 支持；有效；持续 n. 控制；保留 同义词:own, save, support of, stand up for sb, control, preservation, grasp, guiding, command He always holds a pipe between the teeth.他嘴里总叼着烟斗。
adj. 埃及的；埃及人的 n. 埃及人；古代埃及语 The Egyptian authorities would hardly have dared to offer such a prize a decade ago .若是在十年之前，埃及当局几乎不会有勇气授其如此奖励；
adj. 相对的；有关系的；成比例的 n. 亲戚；相关物；[语] 关系词；亲缘植物 同义词:opposing, proportional, kin, belongings Even its successes are only relative .即使成功也只是相对的。
n. 种类；方式；品质 vi. 分类；协调；交往 vt. 将…分类；将…排序；挑选出某物 同义词:category, manner, way of, variety, kind, mode, nature, travel, company, mix, associate, concert, systematize to sort apples by grade按等级把苹果分类
n. 溪流；流动；潮流；光线 vi. 流；涌进；飘扬 vt. 流出；涌出；使飘动 同义词:tide, ray, flow, flood, dance, shed, sweat Blood streams out of his mouth.血从他的嘴角流了出来。
n. 步枪；来复枪 vt. 用步枪射击；抢夺；偷走 同义词:musket, steal away, spirit away Such new arms are rifled.这种新枪炮都加有来复线。
n. 最拥挤部份；活动最多部份；事物的粗大浓密部份 adj. 厚的；浓的；粗大的 adv. 密集地；浓浓地，厚厚地 同义词:deeply, densely It has a pointed face and a thick tail .它有一张尖尖的脸和一条粗粗的尾巴。
n. 油酥点心；面粉糕饼 This kind of pastry is delicious .这种糕点十分可口。
n. 怪物；巨人，巨兽；残忍的人 adj. 巨大的，庞大的 同义词:giant, bugbear, huge, enormous, tremendous, massive, macro Just before I got there , I saw monster running through the trees .就在我到那之前，我看到那个怪物跑过了树林。

n. 弓；鞠躬；船首 vi. 鞠躬；弯腰 vt. 鞠躬；弯腰 adj. 弯曲的 同义词:stem, Yumi, stoop down, bend down, stoop down, bend down, curve, winding, flexural, crooked The branches were bowed down with the weight of the snow.树枝被沉重的积雪压弯了。
n. 马力（功率单位） 同义词:soup For medium and horsepower sizes, this method is generally not cost effective .对于中、大功率（马力）的电机，这种方法通常并不是性价比高的方法。
n. 车间；研讨会；工场；讲习班 同义词:plant, proseminar If China is emitting ever more carbon , that is partly because it has become the workshop ofthe world .如果中国继续排放更多的二氧化碳，那部分原因是因为它已经变成了世界工厂。
n. 手，手艺；帮助；指针；插手 vt. 传递，交给；支持；搀扶 同义词:assistance, craft, aid, index, finger, encourage, carry, second, back, transfer He handed me a necklace last night.昨晚他送给我一条项链。
adv. 一次；曾经 conj. 一旦 n. 一次，一回 同义词:ever, e'er, breath, one time Once you're finished, go home.干完活儿，你就回家吧。
adj. 辉煌的；灿烂的；极好的；杰出的 同义词:brilliant, excellent, wonderful, famous, prominent She chose the most splendid gown she had, and took out her jewels .她从衣饰中选出最华丽的一件长衫，取出她的珠宝。
n. 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人 vt. 使丢脸，使羞愧 同义词:abashment, discountenance, abash I'm shamed to be your friend.作为你的朋友我都感到丢脸。
vt. 使竖立；建造；安装 adj. 竖立的；笔直的；因性刺激而勃起的 vi. 直立；勃起 同义词:construct, fit, fix, structure, frame, straight, upright, to stand on end, get it up to erect a house盖房
vi. 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩 n. 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者 同义词:to spread, to extend, toadeater, kiss-ass The tortoise crept along at a very slow speed.乌龟以极慢的速度向前爬。
n. 马球；水球 同义词:center forward Traveler Marco Polo brought back recipes for chilled and frozen milk from China .旅行家马可·波罗从中国带回烹饪法，可把牛奶冷冻起来。
n. 食欲；嗜好 同义词:weakness, habit, hobby Of all the colors in the spectrum , blue is an appetite suppressant .在光谱的所有颜色中，蓝色是一种抑制食欲的颜色。
n. 手指；指针，指状物 vt. 伸出；用手指拨弄 vi. 用指触摸；拨弄 同义词:index, pointer, extend, reach out to finger a piece of cloth揉搓一块布

n. 去芒器 By making a primary orthogonal regression test , the major factor and best parameter combination were found out, which supply theoretical basis for further research on awn - removed principle and awner .通过一次回归正交试验找出了影响除芒效果的主次因素和最佳参数组合，为进一步研究除芒机理与机具提供了依据。
adj. 遥远的；冷漠的；远隔的 同义词:remote, faraway A faint impression of a submerged castle shimmered in distant background .一座朦胧的水下城堡在深远的背景中微微闪光。
n. 石头；结石；[宝] 宝石 adj. 石的，石制的 vt. 向扔石块；用石头铺 同义词:stane, calculus, lithic He was stoned to death.他是被人用石块砸死的。
n. 世纪，百年；（板球）一百分 They occur perhaps once a century .大概一个世纪会发生一次。
n. 地球；地球仪；球体 vt. 使…成球形 vi. 成球状 同义词:this earthly round, terra, sphere, conglobate The Arctic essentially acts as a refrigerator for the rest of the globe .北极其实就是给地球其余部分起到了一个冰箱的作用。
vi. 踩踏板；骑车 n. 踏板；脚蹬子 vt. 骑（自行车）；踩……的踏板 adj. 脚的；脚踏的 同义词:ride bike, footplate, treadboard, ride He pedaled his bicycle slowly up the hill.他慢悠悠地骑着自行车上山。
vi. 反应；影响；反抗；起反作用 vt. 使发生相互作用；使起化学反应 同义词:impact of, impact on, work on I shouted at her,but she didn't react at all.我向她大声喊叫，但她毫无反应。
n. 飞行；班机；逃走 vt. 射击；使惊飞 vi. 迁徙 同义词:fly, liner, pot, take a shot at Could you get me on an earlier flight ?你能让我搭上早一点的航班吗？
adv. 明显地 同义词:clearly, broadly, markedly, distinctly, visibly Obviously growing up is something all of us do.显然长大成人是所有人都会经过的。
n. 格林威治（英国伦敦东南一市镇， 从前皇家天文台的所在地； 通过该天文台的经线被定为本初子午线） Now she is going to a party in Greenwich Village .此刻，她准备到格林尼治村去参加一个聚会。

n. 脾气；（钢等）回火；性情；倾向 vt. 使回火；锻炼；调和；使缓和 vi. 回火；调和 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition, comfort, take exercises, pop back, back fire He has tempered the strong drink with water.他已经用水将烈酒冲淡。
vi. 投诉；发牢骚；诉说 vt. 抱怨；控诉 同义词:whine about, beef, beef about, rail against She is always complaining.她整天发牢骚。
n. 吹；打击；殴打 vi. 风吹；喘气 vt. 风吹 同义词:stroke, shock, strike, hit, hiding, catch my breath The wind is blowing.风正在刮。
adj. 疲倦的；厌倦的，厌烦的 v. 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式） 同义词:worn, harassed The girl tires easily.这个女孩容易疲劳。
n. [航] 直升飞机 vi. [航] 乘直升飞机 vt. 由直升机运送 同义词:copter, whirlybird, verticraft You can helicopter to the island.你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

adv. 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度 adj. 远的；久远的 n. 远方 同义词:greatly, quite, badly, too, powerful, hoary, agelong, distance, distant place far this year we have conclude more than ten transaction .到目前为止，本年度我们已达成十多笔交易。
vi. 乘出租车；滑行 vt. 使滑行；用出租车送 n. 出租汽车 同义词:coast, motorcab, cab They taxied to the zoo.他们乘出租车去动物园。
n. 检查员；巡视员 同义词:supervisor, looker The inspector reproduced a machine surface to a large enough magnification .检验员把机器表面以足够大的放大倍数复现出来。
abbr. 美国国家航空和宇宙航行局（National Aeronautics and Space Administration） NASA says it 's successfully slammed two spacecraft into the moon early today in search of water .美国国家航空总局说两个宇宙飞船成功的开始进行月球水源寻找探索。
adj. 寂寞的；偏僻的 n. 孤独者 同义词:remote, doleful I am now a lonely being , disunited from society .我现在是一个孤独的人，与社会隔离了。

vt. 使心烦；颠覆；扰乱 vi. 翻倒 adj. 心烦的；混乱的；弄翻的 n. 混乱；翻倒 同义词:disorder, subvert, tip, keel over, chaotic, troubled, confused, disorder, chaos, confusion, turmoil, involvement I've upset a cup of coffee on my shirt.我打翻了一杯咖啡，洒在我的衬衫上了。
n. 地点；位置；场所 vt. 设置；为…选址 同义词:location, spot, situation, where, lie, intercalate, instal to site a new building为新建楼房选址
vi. 滑冰；滑过 n. 溜冰；冰鞋 同义词:ice skating, ice-skate, ice-skating to skate about on the lake在湖面上溜冰玩
n. 队长，首领；船长；上尉；海军上校 vt. 指挥；率领 同义词:leader, chief, boss, officer, officer, boss, lead She captained the basketball team.她是篮球队的队长。
n. 鲨鱼；骗子 vi. 诈骗 vt. 敲诈 同义词:fraud, swindler, con game, extort, black mail At the beach , there was no shark .到了海滩，却看不到任何鲨鱼。
n. 妈妈；木乃伊；干瘪的人 同义词:mom, mama Mummy , can we help you today ?妈妈，我们今天能帮你吗？
n. 遗憾；抱歉；悲叹 vt. 后悔；惋惜；哀悼 vi. 感到后悔；感到抱歉 同义词:pity, sorriness, grieve over, mourn over Do as I tell you,or you'll regret it later on.照我的话去做，否则你以后会后悔的。
adj. 周围的，附近的 n. 环境，周围的事物 同义词:environmental, ambient, context, circumstance, setting, condition Explosions release huge clouds of gas that envelop the surrounding area .爆炸释放出大量的气体云足可以笼罩整个地区。
adj. 侦探的 n. 侦探 同义词:tec, hawkshaw detective inspected the room for fingerprints .侦探检查房间寻找指纹。
n. 轰炸机；投弹手 He also invited Russia to use Venezuela's military airports to refuel its strategic bomber aircraft .他还邀请俄罗斯使用其军用机场，以便俄方为战略轰炸机加油。
adj. 平的；简单的；朴素的；清晰的 n. 平原；无格式；朴实无华的东西 adv. 清楚地；平易地 同义词:simple, defined, plane, flatland, puszta, definitely, fair, expressly The pavement thus laid is to be plained and polished.这样铺的路面需要弄平弄光滑。
n. 犯罪现场；辩解；托辞 vi. 辩解；找借口 vt. 为…辩解 同义词:explanation, venues, apologize, make an excuse to alibi for being defeated为失败辩解
n. 短袜；一击 vt. 重击；给……穿袜 adv. 正着地；不偏不倚地 adj. 非常成功的 同义词:bobbysocks, anklet, pound on, gang bang, smack-dab to sock one's little brother给小弟穿上短袜
n. 志愿者；志愿兵 adj. 志愿的 vi. 自愿 vt. 自愿 I asked if anyone would help me,but no one volunteered.我问谁愿意帮助我，但没有一个人愿意出来帮忙。

adj. 不知道的，无意的；未察觉到的 adv. 意外地；不知不觉地 同义词:unknowing, unware, unexpectedly, accidentally I asked my mother why we lived with such modest means, unaware of how painful it must have been for a single parent with two young boys to field such questions .我问妈妈，为什么我们生活得那么简朴，当时完全没有意识到，对于一个带着两个儿子的单身母亲而言回答这个问题是多么痛苦。
n. 银行；岸；浅滩；储库 vt. 将…存入银行；倾斜转弯 vi. 堆积；倾斜转弯 同义词:shallow, ford, pile, heap up Do you bank at the Village Savings Bank?你在乡村储蓄银行里存有款吗?

adj. 真实的，实际的；现行的，目前的 同义词:practical, sincere, real, effective, true Understanding what is happening —at the level of detail that determines the actual outcome — is nigh impossible .通过决定实际结果层次的细节来理解正在发生的情况的几乎是不可能的。
vi. 徘徊；漫步；迷路；离题 vt. 游荡，漫游 同义词:lose oneself, hang about, range, louse around The speaker's eyes wandered round the whole house.讲演者的眼睛环视了整个房屋。

vt. 扮演；装作，举动像 vi. 行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效 n. 行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势 同义词:play, take a part of, operate, bear oneself, conduct oneself, behavior, dealing, action, going, bill The actress acts the part of the heroine.那位女演员扮演女主角。
adj. 灰色的；灰白的 vt. 使变成灰色；使变老 vi. 变成灰色；老化 n. 灰色 同义词:gray, cinereous, age, grizzle, gray, grigio, Pixel Toy Remix The population of China is set to grey.中国的人口开始趋于老化。
n. （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）梗，柄；追踪；高视阔步 vt. 追踪，潜近；高视阔步 vi. 高视阔步地走；潜近，偷偷接近 同义词:stem, tracking, handle, trail, follow up on, move in on He stalked to the building.他悄悄地靠近了那所建筑。
n. 其时，其间 adv. 同时；其间 同义词:together, simul meantime you know who to blame .同时，你也会知道谁是罪魁祸首。
n. 钱包，皮夹 同义词:bag, purse A young lady handed in a brown wallet yesterday .昨天一位年轻女士交来一个棕色钱包。
vt. 力劝，催促；驱策，推进 n. 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力 vi. 强烈要求 同义词:crowd, rush up, impulse, driving force, scream for He urged her to study English.他极力劝她学习英语。
